item.title: Self-care protips
item.description: Self-care for people who don’t care You hear something is supposed to be good for you. “Yoga,” they say. “You should do some yoga.” Whatever, you think. I have better things to do. It doesn’t seem worth your time, right? It seems silly. And then, when you finally do it, you’re like.. omg that was so life changing and so easy, why didn’t I do that all along? And the next time you have an opportunity to do yoga, you promptly forget how amazing it was and you skip the yoga class.

item.title: Trans* & Genderqueer Resources
item.description: Trans & gender 101 Trans 101 YouTube series Transger Map website Learning about your identity Nonbinary Flowchart — what’s my gender? Being an ally 100 Easy Ways to Make the World Better for Trans People Transitioning Generally, look for clinitians and providers who use an informed consent transition model. item.description: If you are in crisis People want to help you. Even if you are feeling lonely and you just want someone to talk or text with, you can reach out any time day or night.
